headline: Voting Security  Evolves. So Do  Russian Trolls.
abstract: While U.S. cyberdefenses have improved since 2016, many of the vulnerabilities exploited four years ago remain. And attacks are getting more sophisticated.
lead_paragraph: The National Security Agency and its British counterpart issued an unusual warning in October: The Russians were back and growing stealthier.
keywords: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates
